Articles.Content: Reporting in, having just been given this as an advance birthday present (with the Steam sale) by my better half after playing around with the demo for 6 or so hours

Welcome to the forums!

You wouldn't happen to be the same stnylan from the Paradox Interactive forums, would you? Just curious.

At any rate, since you're new to the game, I'd highly recommend that you take a look at the Drawing Board (link in my sig), which has links to a number of tutorials, including some created specifically for new players. Feel free to also ask questions in the How To forums if you ever get stuck on anything.

Happy landings!

Welcome stnylan!

I wish you a nice time and many fireballs! :3

I am indeed the same stnylan from the Paradox Interactive forums, albeit it has been a few years since I was really active there. Who were you, if you don't mind me asking?

Am indeed checking out various resources Thank you for the link.

I am indeed the same stnylan from the Paradox Interactive forums, albeit it has been a few years since I was really active there. Who were you, if you don't mind me asking?

Believe it or not, I go by the same name over there as I do over here I haven't posted there in a while myself, actually. I remember being a huge fan of "Learning Protestantism with Livonia" back in the day, which is how I recognized the name.
